website_summaries.verdict: High-quality leather dog collar that will give you a long-lasting performance.
pros: Nice personalized features –  you can add up to 25 characters and select among 15 colors of thread
Uses a high-quality metal buckle for an adjustable fit
Leather has a soft feel for the dog, and it will last a long time
cons: Only 1 inch wide, so the personalized letters can't be easily read from a distance

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this again!
customer_reviews.text: My only regret is that I did not buy these for all of my dogs. This collar has been in the pond every single day since it came in, and it still looks great!! I got it very fast so that is definitely a plus! There was a loose string on the first letter (in picture) but I have not had any problems with that yet. The orange is more vibrant than the pictures show! I did have to punch another hole into it so it would fit my dog properly, but there was enough space for me to do so without getting close to the letters.
customer_reviews.author: John Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Yay! It's so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the sky blue text on the light brown collar and it looks SO SHARP! Shipping was fast, packaging was good, and the embroidered text is perfect. The collar is really thick, but not at all stiff, and the metal buckle is heavy duty. I'll never worry about this thing snapping. Couldn't be happier - thank you!
customer_reviews.author: bella

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I had a nylon personalized collar, but it kept loosening. This old fashioned buckle is easier to use and more secure than the plastic ones other collars use. This one isn't going to loosen. And it looks great. It's good quality leather, and the contrast between the colored embroidery and the black leather surface looks really nice. I'm surprised it's not more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: honeybearsf

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes can't buy nothing new for your fur baby.
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and love the leather to it..but I guess it's not strong enough for my 115 pound dog. Didn't last for 3 days but still gonna use this collar gonna cut around the info and glue it to the new strong leather collar.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Good product but leather strap failed.
customer_reviews.text: Product came in time and exactly like we wanted. Good embroidery and seemed like a quality product. My 38lbs. Husky just broke the collar after less than 2 weeks of wearing it. The grain of the leather is going up and down instead of the length of the strap which caused it to fail. We have ordered another one for our lab and his strap has the leather grain going the correct way for tensile strength. Just a little quality control saves man best friend from getting loose to run the neighborhood.
customer_reviews.author: danielle cox

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: Marley’s new collar is so nice. The peace of mind of having our phone number on his collar is the best part. He had dug a hole and escaped our fenced yard once. Hasn’t done it again but who knows when he’ll give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra D

customer_reviews.title: I wish there was a excess leather holder near buckle but I was able to order a correct size so it works well.  Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with collar. High quality leather and standout embroidery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love These collars
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have chips and tags, but these are easy to see, if they were to get out or something were to happen people can see their name and number easily!!
customer_reviews.author: MWest

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The did. The writing was large enough to be seen easily, and that is exactly what I wanted. I would definitely recommend getting this dog collar. My only issue, and it was my fault, I should've ordered one size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Nice leather collar
customer_reviews.text: Nice leather collar. I have always wanted one of these for my dogs. The tags you get with your information on them always seem to wear a hole and fall off. So now I don't have to worry about the tag. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Comfort,style and safety!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the look and the feel. I had been a little worried about how the embroidery would look; nothing to worry about. My Labs seem to like them too!
customer_reviews.author: RJ Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dog collar for identification
customer_reviews.text: This dog collar is perfect to assure proper identification without worrying about a lost tag. The collar was colorful and received earlier than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: "Quality and practicality" in this pre-holiday purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Practical and visible identification with quality embossing of each collar for your furry friend. Delivery as promised and aesthetically delightful for our pets and pre-xmas portraits.
customer_reviews.author: India Marie Clamp

customer_reviews.title: great and quality value
customer_reviews.text: great fabrication and very clearly marked name nice embroidery thanks
customer_reviews.author: Monkeypony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these collars! I ordered 2 of the light brown leather with embroidery. They fit as expected and neither of our fur family member seem phased by them; we have a lab and a hound. The collars are much more durable than the nylon kind and no more losing the charm I.d tags
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mia

customer_reviews.title: They worked good for Lucy my dog
customer_reviews.text: They are exactly what you see in the picture. They worked good for Lucy my dog. Measure properly around your dogs neck. The dogs tags can cause issues with the neck as they bump when the dog runs. A good product.
customer_reviews.author: kevin c hoffman

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality leather
customer_reviews.text: So very disappointed in this product. I loved the embroidery but after less than 4 months the leather collar just snapped. What a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Feit

customer_reviews.title: NOT for smaller breeds, 1” collar width...
customer_reviews.text: Collars were great but way too wide for a miniature dachshund or smaller breed. 1” width was not listed in actual item listing but rather only in actual description.
customer_reviews.author: Texas reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this choice!
customer_reviews.text: This collar has a beautiful blend of softness for comfort while maintaining durability. The stitching is easy to read and the turquoise stitching with the light leather looks beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Brewer

customer_reviews.title: This product met my expectations.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with these collars. It's not the best quality but good solid collar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jerry Good
customer_reviews.text: Jerry likes his new collar. Used the “ jolly rancher” embroidery and it looks good!
customer_reviews.author: CCBruno

customer_reviews.title: This is a great collar. Quality product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great collar. Quality product at a great price. We also received this earlier than was scheduled. Make sure you measure your dogs neck. That will ensure you are happy with your purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap leather
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but you can tell its cheaply made. Planning on replacing within the next year.
customer_reviews.author: ABlakely

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these collars for my dogs. They are nicely made and arrived much sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: It fits!
customer_reviews.text: Their sizing instructions were dead on! Thanks for the tips on how to measure to make sure there was a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick J. Schrader

customer_reviews.title: Great collars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome collars! Done right and in a timely order. Couldn't ask for a better personalized collar in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this product. Very nice quality. Fast delivery. We have large dogs and they are unable to get out of this collar.
customer_reviews.author: Kara LeRoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice collar, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Love the embroidery option for phone number-no tags to make noise or get lost!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Spear

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: genuine leather- embroidered, sturdy quality- looks good on him! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: I was very happy with collar but I was confused when ordering so ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with collar but I was confused when ordering so I didn’t get the collar I really wanted. I’m sure it was my fault but was confusing to me
customer_reviews.author: cecil kennington

customer_reviews.title: Really nice leather collar.
customer_reviews.text: This leather collar looks beautiful, is great quality, and was received faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Norman

customer_reviews.title: thank you for making a great product.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, exactly what I was looking for. thank you for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great collars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two for our two labs. Love them!! Just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Favale

customer_reviews.title: Must look good on small dogs
customer_reviews.text: Too thin in width and girth, I got a Dobie..
customer_reviews.author: reid t kaneshiro

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality, the neon green really pops and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality , the neon green really pops and is visible. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great collar. I can tell it’s good quality and made to last
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The collar is super cute and fits my dog perfectly! He’s 7 months old (German Shepherd) and it will continue to fit into his full grown body from the looks of it! The lettering is perfect and super sweet! Thank you sooo much! He looks so handsome and I get a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha felsheim

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 for my 2 German Shepherds. Love the quality and the personalization stitching. Unfortunately, they were too big for my dogs. I contacted the company and they responded quickly and will be sending new smaller collars. Excellent customer service! I will order from them again and refer them to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: MissShe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love GoTags, I have purchased several. This is my first in leather and it’s very nice. Looks great on my GSP!
customer_reviews.author: Helton Jolly

customer_reviews.title: GREAT COLLAR
customer_reviews.text: This is a great collar, durable and stylish. I received a coupon in the mail for 10% of my next order until September 30, 2018 after the collar arrived. Tried to order 2 more collars for my other dogs using the coupon and Amazon wouldn't accept it. The coupon can only be used on gotags.com where the price of the collar is more than on Amazon. POINTLESS!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

product_meta.title: GoTags Personalized Leather Dog Collars, Custom Embroidered with Pet Name and Phone Number, Soft Brown Leather Dog Collar for Medium and Large Dogs, Great Alternative to Pet ID Tags
product_meta.description:
Color:Dark BrownDurably made with comfort and function in mind, our high quality, full grain Italian leather ID collars feature:
- 2 collar color options: Light Brown and Dark Brown
- soft, supple leather for a comfortable fit
- strong, wear resistant, polished stainless steel buckle and D-ring for attaching tags and leash
- this natural leather product will show some variation in color and will develop a patina over its lifetime 

Personalized Embroidery:
- embroidery is permanently stitched through the collar for strength and long-lasting identification
- 15 embroidery thread color options to choose from
- personalized text (e.g., dog name & phone number) is limited to 25 characters maximum, including spaces
- collars are personalized using all CAPITAL letters for legibility

Collar Sizing:
- 5 collar size options:
* 14-16 in
* 16-18 in
* 18-21 in
* 20-23 in
* 22-25 in
- all collars are 1 inch wide
- collars feature 4 sizing holes for a flexible, comfort fit
- collar fit: all GoTags dog collars with a metal buckle have 4 sizing holes and are sized from the first hole to the last. The first hole, the smallest the collar will adjust down to, should fit your pet's neck snuggly; the other 3 holes will allow for a wider, comfort fit on your pet.

English alphabet characters only.
feature_bullets: Made with durable, full grain Italian leather conditioned for a soft yet sturdy finish, features a strong stainless steel buckle & d-ring connector. To see all of our pet identification products, click GoTags above the product title on this page
Permanently embroidered with your dog’s name & phone. 15 embroidery thread color options
2 leather colors: Dark Brown or Light Brown; in 5 collar sizes: 14-16”; 16-18”; 18-21”; 20-23”; and 22-25". All collars are 1" wide

All GoTags dog collars with a metal buckle have 4 sizing holes and are sized from the first hole to the last. The first hole, the smallest the collar will adjust down to, should fit your pet's neck snuggly; the other 3 holes will allow for a wider, comfort fit on your pet.
To order click Customize Now. When personalizing your collar, enter: 1) Collar Size 2) Thread Color 3) Collar Text
